hook.text: From cave walls to TikTok, the medium changes every century. The urge to tell stories never does.

buildup.text: Humans have told stories through paint, clay, paper, radio, film, screens, and now algorithms.

twist.text: The medium is never the message when it comes to stories. The message is always about being human.

punchline.text: Stories are the one technology we'll never replace.
